Forests Monitor bụ òtù na-abụghị nke gọọmentị nke e guzobere na Cambridge, England, n'afọ 1993, iji kwado ndị na-adabere n'oké ọhịa ma mee ka ọha na eze mara banyere mmetụta ọjọọ nke mmebi ọhịa ụlọ ọrụ nwere na ndị bi n'oké osimiri ndị a na gburugburu ebe obibi na-akwado ha, gụnyere ọtụtụ osisi na anụmanụ
Ebumnobi ha bụ inye ndị NGO na otu ụmụ amaala nwere mmasị nyocha nyocha gbasara ụlọ ọrụ ọhịa na ihe ha na-eme, wee kwado ma nyekwa ndị omume ọjọọ aka
Forests Monitor bụ ụlọ ọrụ anaghị akwụ ụgwọ, na-abụghị nke gọọmentị.
Forests Monitor na-enyekwa aka na nhazi amụma oke ọhịa nke mba ụwa na nke mba site na usoro zuru ụwa ọnụ dịka UNFF na usoro mmanye iwu na ọchịchị mpaghara (FLEG) dị ka African FLEG na ENA FLEG
Akuko nkwenye maka ịda ogbenye echekwabara 2007-07-31 na igwe Wayback mebere n'etiti Forests Monitor na The Rainforest Foundation na-ekwu okwu ndị a.
Forests Monitor bụ òtù na-eduga na ọrụ ugbu a nke nlekota oru oke ọhịa na Republic of Congo, na-arụ ọrụ na mmekorita ya na REM (Resource Extraction Monitoring).
Forests Monitor tinyere UCL ExCiteS mepụtara beta version nke ngwa mkpanaka dị ka akụkụ nke ọrụ ha na Republic of Congo, nke na-enyere obodo ndị dị n'ógbè ahụ aka nyochaa ọrụ ọhịa gburugburu obodo ha

Ọ bụ ezie na ngwa ewepụtara na webụsaịtị ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ naanị ụdị beta, ikike ahụ bụ Apache 2 mepere emepe, ebumnuche ya bụ ịgba ndị otu ndị ọzọ ume ka ha jiri usoro a nyere ndị mmadụ aka ichekwa gburugburu mpaghara ha.
Forests Monitor kwadoro nguzobe nke ntụkwasị obi ọrụ ebere, Forests Monitor Charitable Trust
Forests Monitor Charitable Trust kwụsịrị ọrụ n'afọ 2011
Forests Monitor Ltd (òtù na-enweghị uru) na-aga n'ihu na ọrụ ya.
Forests Monitor arụla ọtụtụ ọrụ n'ụwa niile iji nyocha na ịkwalite mmata maka ụlọ ọrụ ọhịa
